title: Lab Safety Training
content: Annual lab safety training will be held next Friday at 2 PM in Conference Room A. All lab members must attend.

title: HPLC Pressure Issues
content: The HPLC #2 is showing high backpressure. I've changed the guard column but the issue persists. Has anyone else experienced this?

title: Updated RNA Extraction Protocol
content: I've optimized the RNA extraction protocol to improve yield. See attached details and feedback welcome.

title: Inventory Reorganization
content: We will be reorganizing the chemical storage cabinets this Thursday. Please plan your experiments accordingly as access might be limited.

title: Welcome New Lab Members
content: Please join me in welcoming Dr. Lisa Wong and graduate student Mark Thompson to our lab team!
